Bash(# Check which commands ARE in the command contract / dispatcher python3 -c "" import json contract = json.load\(open\(''/Users/fredbook/Code/uDOS/core/config/ucli_command_contract_v1_3.json''\)\) cmds = list\(contract.get\(''commands'', {}\).keys\(\)\) if ''commands'' in contract else [] if not cmds: # try top-level keys cmds = list\(contract.keys\(\)\) print\(''Top-level keys:'', cmds[:20]\) "" # Check dispatcher to see what handler mappings exist vs what''s in __init__.py grep -n ""music_handler\\|home_handler\\|web_handler\\|export_handler\\|mesh_handler\\|okfix\\|nethack"" \\ /Users/fredbook/Code/uDOS/core/tui/dispatcher.py \\ /Users/fredbook/Code/uDOS/core/commands/__init__.py)
